name: ROBOKILL (itch) (E.E-Wick)
description:
In this sci-fi thriller, a robot goes rogue and begins to desire the taste of humans.

A very cool eat'em up game.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

A game by E.E-Wick

 with music by ConnorGrail

Cover art by HIS

///////////CONTROLS//////////////

Arrow Keys, WASD/ZQSD – MOVE

Mouse – ROTATE CAMERA

Left Mouse Button – PUNCH

Right Mouse Button – THROW HEAD

Space – SELECT IN MENU

Escape -- PAUSE

Eat dead bodies by walking into them
